pageContext.title: DIRTY FILTHY MUGS – Stir The Pot
pageContext.content:
Another smash album from Dirty Filthy Mugs! Includes the tracks: Stir The Pot (P. Buster) On My Way to Start a Fistfight (exclusive to the 7″)

Featuring former members of Swingin’ Utters, The Gain and Big In Japan! Dirty Filthy Mugs is a band I stumbled across when I saw their video for single ’Tony And Vinny’ and instantly took to. The band is in your face but sing along punk rock, accompanied by razor gruff vocals and sounding heavily influenced by the UK punk groups such as Cockney Rejects and Cock Sparrer but album opener ‘Frontline Hooligans’ and follow up ‘Its madness what kept me sane’ sound more like US East coast/ Boston style Irish tinged street punk and Oi instead of their LA base. – Distorted Magazine
